name: Motion detection - Big Red Button
description: Motion detection ultimate  Instruction: Press the big red button. Make sure your phone is steady.  On Motion detection you can: Capture Images. Sound Alarm. Record 10 seconds videos. Vibrate.  Main features: * Choose to save images with low or high resolution. * Choose from different alarm sounds. * Choose auto focus. * Choose motion detection sensitivity.  Choose from 3 different Motion detection algorithms :  * Fast & optimized. * Brighness comparison. * Fast brighness comparison. Choose from Settings->Motion detection Algorithm.
